FILE: cm140620v11.0.txt
DYAD: BRAZIL - LIBYA
RIVALRY: RIV331
DISPUTE(S): MID3068 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170721
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170729

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3068 

TERRMID: MID3068 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID3068 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID3068 from MID-B data, this MID has date range 4/16/1983-4/30/1983. From NYT 4.21.1983, Brazil grounded 4 Libyan planes carrying arms and explosives. Brazil suspected the planes were headed to Nicaragua and decided not to let it leave with its cargo. Coded not territory because the border was not disputed. 

TERRLINK: MID3068 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3068 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID3068 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3068 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3068 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3068 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3068 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3068 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3068 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3068 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3068 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3068 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3068 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3068 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:
